text: Jared Christopher Martin (December 21, 1941 â€“ May 24, 2017) was an American movie and television actor. He was best known for his role as Steven "Dusty" Farlow in the 1978 series Dallas and for roles on two science fiction TV shows, The Fantastic Journey and War of the Worlds. He was born in Manhattan, New York. Martin died on May 24, 2017 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania from pancreatic cancer at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Pennsylvania Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Jared Martin
